mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (useremail, userpass, usernickname) values (#{userEmail},#{userPass},#{userNickname})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum ronum, a.* from ( select m.*, u.usernickname from userinfo u, musicboard m, boardlike l where m.useremail = u.useremail and m.no = l.boardno and bdtype = #{bdType} and l.useremail = #{userEmail} order by m.boarddate desc)a) where ronum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
